mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO cf_theta_feature ( id ,feature0 ,feature1 ,feature2 ,feature3 ,feature4 ,feature5 ,feature6 ,feature7 ,feature8 ,feature9 ,feature10 ,feature11 ,feature12 ,feature13 ,feature14 ,feature15 ,feature16 ,feature17 ,feature18 ,feature19 ) VALUES
( IFNULL(#{feature.id},0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature0}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature1}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature2}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature3}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature4}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature5}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature6}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature7}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature8}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature9}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature10}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature11}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature12}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature13}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature14}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature15}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature16}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature17}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature18}, 0) ,IFNULL(#{feature.feature19}, 0) )
